languages.text: {n}Зыбкий силуэт возникает в пересечении лучей света, испускаемых колдовским устройством.{/n} "А, маленькая рабыня догматов. Та, что так удачно привела меня и моих братьев на эту планету. Ты вернулась ко мне. Как кстати!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Зыбкий силуэт возникает в пересечении лучей света, испускаемых колдоввским устройством.{/n} "А, маленькая рабыня догматов. Та, что так удачно привела меня и моих братьев на эту планету. Ты вернулась ко мне. Как кстати!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"
languages.original_text: {n}Зыбкий силуэт возникает в пересечении лучей света, испускаемых колдовским устройством.{/n} "А, маленькая рабыня догматов. Та, что так удачно привела меня и моих братьев на эту планету. Ты вернулась ко мне. Как кстати!"

traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}呪術のデバイスから放たれる光が1点に集まるところに、さざ波のようなシルエットが現れた。{/n}「ああ、教義の操り人形か。親切にも私と私の仲間をこの惑星に連れてきてくれた。戻ってきたのか。それも良いタイミングで！」
languages.original_text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"

traits.locale_text: {n}呪術のデバイスから放たれる光が1点に集まるところに、さざ波のようなシルエットが現れた。{/n}「ああ、教義の操り人形か。親切にも私と私の仲間をこの惑星に連れてきてくれた。戻ってきたのか。それも良いタイミングで！」
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}巫术装置光线汇聚的地方，浮现出了波纹状的影子。{/n}“啊，国教的小傀儡。你真是个好姑娘，是你把我和我的兄弟们带到了这颗行星。如今，你又回到了我身边，而且你来得正是时候！”
languages.original_text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"

traits.locale_text: {n}巫术装置光线汇聚的地方，浮现出了波纹状的影子。{/n}“啊，国教的小傀儡。你真是个好姑娘，是你把我和我的兄弟们带到了这颗行星。如今，你又回到了我身边，而且你来得正是时候！”
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}Une silhouette ondoyante se matérialise au point de convergence des rayons lumineux émis par l'appareil ensorcelé.{/n} « Ah, la petite esclave des dogmes. Celle qui a eu l'amabilité de nous conduire sur cette planète, mes frères et moi. Vous revenez juste à temps ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une silhouette ondoyante se matérialise au point de convergence des rayons lumineux émis par l'appareil ensorcelé.{/n} « Ah, la petite esclave des dogmes. Celle qui a eu l'amabilité de nous conduire sur cette planète, mes frères et moi. Vous revenez juste à temps ! »
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}Una silueta borrosa aparece donde los rayos de luz del dispositivo brujo se cruzan.{/n} «Ah, la marioneta del dogma. La que fue tan amable de traernos a mis hermanos y a mí a este planeta. Vuelves a mí, ¡justo a tiempo!».
languages.original_text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una silueta borrosa aparece donde los rayos de luz del dispositivo brujo se cruzan.{/n} «Ah, la marioneta del dogma. La que fue tan amable de traernos a mis hermanos y a mí a este planeta. Vuelves a mí, ¡justo a tiempo!».
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}Wo die Lichtstrahlen aus dem magischen Gerät zusammenlaufen, erscheint eine vibrierende Silhouette.{/n} "Ah, die kleine Marionette der Dogmen! Die so freundlich war, mich und meine Brüder auf diesen Planeten zu bringen. Ihr seid zu mir zurückgekehrt. Und das genau zum richtigen Zeitpunkt!"
languages.original_text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Wo die Lichtstrahlen aus dem magischen Gerät zusammenlaufen, erscheint eine vibrierende Silhouette.{/n} "Ah, die kleine Marionette der Dogmen! Die so freundlich war, mich und meine Brüder auf diesen Planeten zu bringen. Ihr seid zu mir zurückgekehrt. Und das genau zum richtigen Zeitpunkt!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: {n}Sihirli cihazdan saçılan ışık demetlerinin kavuştuğu yerde dalgalı bir silüet beliriyor.{/n} "Dogmaların minik kuklası, sen misin? Beni ve kardeşlerimi bu gezegene yönlendirme nezaketinde bulunmuştun. Bana geri dönmüşsün, hem de tam zamanında!"
languages.original_text: {n}A rippling silhouette appears where the light rays coming from the sorcerous device converge.{/n} "Ah, the little puppet of dogmas. The one who was so kind as to bring me and my brethren to this planet. You've returned to me. And just at the right time, too!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sihirli cihazın kavuştuğu yerden süzülen ışık hüzmesinin içinden, dalgalanan bir silüet beliriyor.{/n} "Ah, dogmaların minik kuklası değil mi bu? Beni ve kardeşlerimi bu gezegene yönlendirme nezaketinde bulunmuştun. Bana geri dönmüşsün, hem de tam zamanında!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker
